glsa.title: libwpd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: libwpd is vulnerable to several heap overflows and an integer overflow.

background.p: libwpd is a library used to convert Wordperfect documents into other formats.

description.p: libwpd contains heap-based overflows in two functions that convert WordPerfect document tables. In addition, it contains an integer overflow in a text-conversion function.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to convert a specially crafted WordPerfect file, resulting in a crash or possibly the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running libwpd.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libwpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
